title: New: Max Jury – Love That Grows Old
content:
I’m a sucker for this Tobias Jesso Jr.

-esque sound. Midway between the 60’s crooners and 80’s classic rock, Love That Grows Old, the new song from Max Jury, lifted from his self-titled album, is slickly produced whilst managing to maintain the honesty and emotional integrity that makes it so appealing. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
